title: On Compton ionization of a hydrogen atom by twisted photons
abstract:
The differential probability of the process of Compton ionization of a
hydrogen atom by a cylindrical electromagnetic wave is calculated taking into
account the finite size of the target, which resulted in the appearance of a
dependence of this value on the angular momentum of the cylindrical wave. It is
shown that the use of a cylindrical wave instead of a plane wave does not lead
to new angular distributions of the reaction products.
